55a533f3-b42a-45dd-9fbf-398a878a288e: "And so He gave us a sign, and bathed our humble visages in the light of the emerald lumen!"
94d54a4a-e15f-4b37-9601-880243d35a57: "Lay bare your adamantine being and let these lowly hands perform the sacred rite."
3519c2cd-9815-4dce-8248-bf591bcac662: "Let the boon of the Motive Force bless this cogitator's hallowed cathodes!"
b1801cfc-6e6b-4fd9-ba08-45777e79e540: "May this healing salve banish the malady from the ravaged flesh of this mechanism!"
5c8d3d08-dd2e-4a34-a725-e6d3b0630a78: "Slice the seal open with a consecrated blade and let the valve drink of the oil of life."
f6b3eba3-2351-47e3-99bc-1705a5ccd83c: "With the turn of this spanner, I do praise the Omnissiah's wisdom!"
